channel.title: Illegal to defend yourself against a women?
channel.description: I just got into a fight with my sister and I told my dad about it and he said, "If your were 18 you would be in jail if you hit a women".So i was wondering if you think its illegal to hit a women if your defending yourself?Maybe if it is true,then could you give me some links?.My Dad got put in jail from holding my other sister down from hurting my mother.

item.title: Illegal to defend yourself against a women?
item.dc:creator: @Aaron2 Aaron;
item.description:
@Aaron2 wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:41, topic:202669”][quote author=cooper link=topic=267365.msg2215634#msg2215634 date=1210141654]

Go die in a hole.

Painfully, with STDs and rabies! And castration.
[/quote] ouch

[/quote]

<3

item.dc:creator: @Aaron2 Aaron;
item.description:
@Aaron2 wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:35, topic:202669”][quote author=Aaron; link=topic=267365.msg2215280#msg2215280 date=1210062697]
i beat the shit out of a girl at school for biting me, she is on probation, i got off scott free, and all i did was break her nose arm and give her a black eye, i was a black belt in Karate, i know all 14 Kata’s owned that bitch, but i got in trouble for beating up someone really bad with a Kumari Katana -.-
[/quote] Really just go nuts, only took 1 year to become a black belt, because Master kunichi, gave me two belts when i did a 2 brick brake.

Your awesome man, can you teach me? PLZ PLZ PLZ? howz do i be a ninja like u?[/quote]

item.title: Illegal to defend yourself against a women?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:9, topic:202669”][quote author=Chimaera God link=topic=267365.msg2208076#msg2208076 date=1209750017]
OFFTOPIC: PCP iss supposed to give you crazy amounts of strength or spmething. Imagie the world’s strongest man, but with his adrenaline pumping at like 30 times the normal amount. Taking PCP alwas usually ends in death cause when the cops come to get you, you’ll probably try to kill them lol, so they’ll have to put abut 7-12 bullets in you to take you down.
[/quote]

Sorry to disappoint you, but the media and the cops made that up :([/quote]

Actually, this guy I know (a cop) beat a dude on PCP with his flashlight (what cop doesn’t?) about 50 times at full strength, and the guy still didn’t go down. And those lights are fucking heavy. His partner had a few whacks as well.
Ended up breaking his own wrist on a blow.
Moral of the story: Viva America.

Read full topic

item.title: Illegal to defend yourself against a women?
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

Actually, in America self defense is equal or lesser force used to defend your life. Now if you genuinely felt you life was in danger, you would be aloud to murder that person. In self defense of course.

Boy do I love that law…

You know how many people take advantage of it?

@offtopic: Is it defence or defense?

item.title: Illegal to defend yourself against a women?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:18, topic:202669”][quote author=magma828 link=topic=267365.msg2212947#msg2212947 date=1209928143]

Can’t blame them, nearly every car crash has a woman driver.

Let’s have some citations here now…
[/quote]
My mom got in a car crash, but it was 100% the other persons fault. Guess what, it was some woman with a shitload of plants in the front seat so she couldn’t see at all to her right, and went right through a stop sign.

Also, in the US, isn’t it legal to shoot and kill somebody who breaks into your house? Some bullshit with an amendment and guns…[/quote]
I think the law is that if they are running away from you in your own house, you cannot shoot them. But if they are approaching you, you might be able to shoot them legally. There are a lot of conditions (if they’re armed, etc).

Read full topic
